message.body: #### has a jumpsuit from so pace camp. He days it would probably fit someone ######'s size. I think maybe someone a little larger.
I think #### is about my height but really skinny... That might work!! Let me check on her size real quick and see what she thinks
It will fit height wise, but she is gonna have to be really skinny
The waistband is elastic so there is some stretch
Crap. I thought she was shorter but she's 5'9". I don't think that will work
Probably not... If I hold it up to me it is about 3 inches above my ankle.
Ha ha. Okay... If it's not a huge bother can you bring it to mega bad tomorrow? It won't fit #### but it might fit one of her other staffers
We're all set on the suits now, so don't worry about bringing ####'s. We really appreciate it, though!
